amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the USDA to administer the floor price for quota peanuts at no more than $550 per ton.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funding to provide a peanut price support loan rate greater that $550 per ton for quota peanuts.

action.text: On agreeing to the Neumann amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 244 (Roll No. 258).
